DOCNAME: CASE OF SHURYGINA AND OTHERS v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Enforcement proceedings;Article 6-1 - Access to court);Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions);Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions)
TEXT: CARDINAL . On various dates the applicants brought civil actions against ORG of GPE , seeking to recover the monetary value of ORG promissory notes for purchases of Russianmade cars .

CARDINAL . The first - instance courts found in the applicants’ favour . Those judgments were upheld on appeal and became final . They were subsequently quashed by supervisory review courts upon applications lodged by ORG on the grounds of incorrect application of substantive law ( for more details , see the Appendix ) .
CARDINAL . All the judgments in the ORG favour remained unenforced until DATE of their quashing .
